text: Agbi idoolay Barti nabnah digib qaagite wayta, toysa dambi keenil mayan sarak-tu baaxol haanamah (cijaab sara kinnuk) bilqa aybullee waa agabuh anuk, Ama cijaab sara (ibaay amo inkih keenik Qellisa sara kinnuk) haysitaanam aysuk keenih raqta, Yalli sin maxcooca yaabbi, sin lubbittet tanim yaaxigi
